Title: Establishes an electronic benefits replacement card program
Summary: Directs the commissioner of the office of temporary and disability assistance to develop and implement a program to replace all magnetic-strip electronic benefit transfer cards issued by or on behalf of the state with chip-enabled smart cards; provides for reimbursement of benefits.
LawCode: Add ยง152-e, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing an electronic benefit card replacement program
